text: "Someday" is a song by American singer and songwriter Mariah Carey. ==Release== This song is from her self-titled debut studio album (1990). It is a pop, new jack swing and R&B; song. It was one of the songs that was on Carey's demo tape. It was written by Carey and Ben Margulies. "Someday" was released as the album's third single on November 28, 1990. ==Reviews== The song was a critical and commercial success. It was described as an album highlight. It became Carey's third consecutive number-one single on the US Billboard Hot 100. ==Formats and track listings== * 12-inch vinyl and cassette single # "Someday" (New 12" House) – 6:50 # "Someday" (Pianoapercaloopapella) – 4:14 #
